text: Meet APhA members Krista Capehart and Gretchen Garofoli, two #pharmacists who designed and helped implement West Virginia's remarkable #COVID19 #vaccine program, one of the most effective in the nation. Listen to the new episode of #LockedonPharmacy:   https://t.co/X4lGdpKL1C https://t.co/v4A2S87yMr
